## isExtrudedLineTechnique() function

Type guard to check if an object is an instance of \[\[BasicExtrudedLineTechnique\]\] or \[\[StandardExtrudedLineTechnique\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isExtrudedLineTechnique(technique: Technique): technique is BasicExtrudedLineTechnique | StandardExtrudedLineTechnique;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  technique | [Technique](./harp-datasource-protocol.technique.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

technique is [BasicExtrudedLineTechnique](./harp-datasource-protocol.basicextrudedlinetechnique.md) \| [StandardExtrudedLineTechnique](./harp-datasource-protocol.standardextrudedlinetechnique.md)
